channel.title: Icon PS: Your adventure is a click away | #1 Custom RSPS |
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/eB3u6NL.png[/img] [B][SIZE=5][URL=http://"http://icon-ps.com/"]Home[/URL] ~ [URL=http://"http://icon-ps.com/forum"]Forums[/URL] ~ [URL=http://"https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/38535602/IconPS/icon.jar"]Download[/URL] ~ [URL=http://"http://icon-ps.com/"]Play Now[/URL][/SIZE][/B]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/MPX3goJ.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://topg.org/osbanners/9219_7011.gif[/img]
[B]Icon PS[/B] is a Runescape Private Server made for those that [B]love custom items & NPC's[/B]. We have great developers working for us and have enough experience to bring your suggestions to a reality. We don't mind criticism as it helps us improve our skills. We bring you the best and only the best customs!
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iJof8UvfsWM[/youtube]

item.title: Icon PS: Your adventure is a click away | #1 Custom RSPS |
item.dc:creator: @Aj_Williams Aj Williams
item.description:
@Aj_Williams wrote:

[quote=“Welliton_inc, post:8, topic:552532”]I take back what I said. Even though I dislike 474+ revisions, this server is pretty well made. There is lots to do, many activities to keep people busyand there are many people who play.

I opened up the starter mbox and got a white santa hat 0.0[/quote]

Thank you so much for your feedback. I am glad you like the server now. I know many owners say this but I am very fortunate to have a community so dedicated to helping out newcomers & being very friendly.

I think this thread speaks for itself: http://icon-ps.com/forum/showthread.php?2238-What-do-you-enjoy-about-Icon-PS

Read full topic

I take back what I said. Even though I dislike 474+ revisions, this server is pretty well made. There is lots to do, many activities to keep people busyand there are many people who play.

item.title: Icon PS: Your adventure is a click away | #1 Custom RSPS |
item.dc:creator: @Aj_Williams Aj Williams
item.description:
@Aj_Williams wrote:

[quote=“Welliton_inc, post:2, topic:552532”]Just looks like another server filled with ripped customs from Mikescape that have no meaning to them.

Also there literally have been 15 servers pretty much the exact same as this posted this week.[/quote]

There is a difference between my server and those random 15 servers. Those servers don’t plan anything. They just host because they want to have the success that I have. They think adding a bunch of customs will get them money. They have a weebly website and an enjin forum. When they receive donations, they take it for themselves and don’t spend any money on advertisements or to buy DDoS protection or a Domain for their server. They get a bunch of players on the first day because they advertise their servers on other big servers. The owners of such servers are probably 12-15 year olds who are not taught anything about an economy and how to keep it stable. If you go to these new custom rsps’s they promote their server like this: “Join our server and you will get free items/rank/staff” and they actually give out free items/rank/staff just to keep those 10 players. But there is a difference between a loyal player and one that seeks for easy stuff or rank. You all know this, I don’t have to remind you all. It’s the same with every other type of Runescape Private Server.

Look at the difference between my thread layout and those random 15 servers & tell me if we are different or not. Yes, our main feature is customs but we know how to promote it & have been successful for over 3 months with 50+ active players daily. Many custom servers come and go but we have been up too long for someone to tell us we are just another custom server.

Please try to understand that we are trying our best to have a server that the players of the RSPS community enjoy. We appreciate criticism as long as it’s thought through and has a valid point.

Read full topic
item.source: Icon PS: Your adventure is a click away | #1 Custom RSPS |

item.title: Icon PS: Your adventure is a click away | #1 Custom RSPS |
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“Welliton_inc, post:5, topic:552532”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=671449.msg4490275#msg4490275 date=1437326171]

Just looks like another server filled with ripped customs from Mikescape that have no meaning to them.

Also there literally have been 15 servers pretty much the exact same as this posted this week.

How come mikescape is the only custom server you know of?
You do know Project Rainbow exists right… I believe (Do not quote me on this) the last version of PR had like 2700 customs or so…
[/quote]

I’m aware of PR’s vast amount of customs.

I say MikeScape because MikeScape handmade most of their customs. This server is filled with them.

Even if he did steal them, the server itself isn’t anything unique or different in any way. I am not even joking, there have been 15 servers that look the EXACT same as this that have been posted within a week.[/quote]
The current trend right now is PI’s stuffed with customs. Atrocious.

Read full topic
